name: Lionel Seinturier
content: Lionel Seinturier Home Page Lionel SEINTURIER University of Lille Faculty of Science and Technology Department of Computer Science Leader of the Spirals research group (joint project-team between Inria, the University of Lille, and CNRS) Research Activities My research interests include distributed systems, middleware, and self-adaptive software systems. publications FraSCAti: a reconfigurable and service-oriented middleware platform for SOA Juliac: a framework for generating component execution kernels AOKell: an aspect-oriented implementation of the Fractal component model JAC: a framework for dynamic aspect-oriented programming Foundations of AOP for J2EE Development Programmation orientée aspect pour Java/J2EE Program Committees ECSA 2025 2024 2023 2022 ICSA NIER 2025 ICSOC 2025 2024 2023 2022 2021 2020 2019 2018 2017 2016 ICWS 2025 2024 2023 SAC SA-TTA 2025 2024 2022 2021 2020 2019 2018 2017 2016 2015 Enseignement M1 : Conception d'applications réparties (CAR) M2 : Systèmes répartis avancés 1 (SRA1) [gitlab] MOOC Java EE Spring prêt à l'emploi (session 5) site web du cours Contact Email: lionel.seinturier <at> univ-lille.fr GitHub: seintur LinkedIn: Lionel Seinturier Lionel Seinturier. 28 March 2025.
